title: Deny Me
description: What's that old saying... Sometimes the cure is worse than the poison?That's Jacob Warfield.My illness, my heart, my disease, my soul.We're doomed together now--someone in the Ashwood Society has it out for Jake, and that means they have it out for me. We have to discover the source of these powers... And how to control them.Before someone dies.
author: Jayla Kane
